name: BorgWarner Inc.
description: BorgWarner Inc. is a global leader in advanced automotive technology, specializing in propulsion systems for combustion, hybrid, and electric vehicles. Founded in 1928, the company has a long-standing history of innovation and excellence in the automotive sector. BorgWarner designs and manufactures a wide range of products, including turbochargers, transmissions, and electric vehicle components, which enhance vehicle performance, fuel efficiency, and emissions control. The company is committed to sustainability and is actively investing in electrification technologies to meet the growing demand for cleaner and more efficient vehicles. With its diverse portfolio and strong engineering capabilities, BorgWarner is positioned to be a key player in the future of mobility, providing solutions that support the transition to a more sustainable automotive landscape. The company operates in several markets worldwide, serving major automotive manufacturers and contributing to the development of smart mobility solutions. BorgWarner’s mission is to deliver innovative and sustainable powertrain solutions that drive the automotive industry forward, ensuring a cleaner, greener future for generations to come.
